org.zaproxy.zap

Class ZapHttpConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.httpclient.SimpleHttpConnectionManager
      • org.zaproxy.zap.ZapHttpConnectionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnectionManager

    public class ZapHttpConnectionManager
extends org.apache.commons.httpclient.SimpleHttpConnectionManager
    Custom SimpleHttpConnectionManager that uses ZapHttpConnection for connection creation. Needed to expose the underlying socket.
